904	progressive dysphagia


4 queries search time: 0.28058333333333335 min

µ is parameter mu in line 16 of QueryRetrievalModel
considering Dirichlet smoothing method,if µ is very large, we donot know which term will control the score. On the contrary,if µ is very small the match words will rule the score.
So its set 2000 here.

java:JDK 1.8
